TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi CheckedListBox extends System.Windows.Forms.ListBox

summary.span: Displays a in which a check box is displayed to the left of each item.

span.span: Displays a in which a check box is displayed to the left of each item.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此控件显示用户可以通过使用键盘或滚动条控件右侧导航的项的列表。This control presents a list of items that the user can navigate by using the keyboard or the scrollbar on the right side of the control. 用户可以通过其中一个放置一个复选标记或更多的项并选中的项可以使用导航和。The user can place a check mark by one or more items and the checked items can be navigated with the and . 若要在运行时将对象添加到列表，将分配与对象引用的数组方法。To add objects to the list at run time, assign an array of object references with the method. 然后，列表显示每个对象的默认字符串值。The list then displays the default string value for each object. 可以将各个项添加到包含列表方法。You can add individual items to the list with the method. 对象支持通过三种状态枚举： ， ，和。The object supports three states through the enumeration: , , and . 必须设置的状态代码中的用户界面因为不提供一种机制来执行此操作。You must set the state of in the code because the user interface for a does not provide a mechanism to do so. 如果是`true`，则将识别并展开项的文本，创建列中的制表符字符数。If is `true`, the will recognize and expand tab characters in an item's text, creating columns. 这些选项卡停止预设的并且无法更改。These tab stops are preset and cannot be changed. 若要使用自定义选项卡停止，将到`false`，请设置到`true`，并添加到了自定义值集合。To use custom tab stops, set to `false`, set to `true`, and add the custom values to the collection. > [!NOTE] > 如果属性是`false`，则将忽略属性，并将其替换为标准的制表位偏移量。If the property is `false`, the property will be ignored and replaced with standard tab offsets. 类支持以下三个索引的集合：The class supports the following three indexed collections: |集合Collection|封装类Encapsulating Class| |----------------|-------------------------| |中包含的所有项控件。All items contained in the control.|| |选中项 （包括处于不确定状态的项），其中的项的子集包含在控件。Checked items (including items in an indeterminate state), which is a subset of the items contained in the control.|| |检查索引，这是到的项集合的索引子集。Checked indexes, which is a subset of the indexes into the items collection. 这些索引指定项在选中或不确定状态。These indexes specify items in a checked or indeterminate state.|| 以下三个表都是三个索引集合的类支持。The following three tables are examples of the three indexed collections that the class supports. 第一个表提供控件 （包含在控件中的所有项） 中的项的索引集合的示例。The first table provides an example of the indexed collection of items in the control (all items contained in the control). |索引Index|项Item|检查状态Check State| |-----------|----------|-----------------| |00|对象 1Object 1|| |11|对象 2Object 2|| |22|对象 3Object 3|| |33|对象 4Object 4|| |44|对象 5Object 5|| 第二个表提供了选中项的索引集合的示例。The second table provides an example of the indexed collection of the checked items. |索引Index|项Item| |-----------|----------| |00|对象 2Object 2| |11|对象 4Object 4| |22|对象 5Object 5| 第三个表提供了选中项的索引的索引集合的示例。The third table provides an example of the indexed collection of indexes of checked items. |索引Index|项的索引Index of Item| |-----------|-------------------| |00|11| |11|33| |22|44| ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用方法、 属性和集合的。The following example illustrates how you can use the methods, properties, and collections of a . 这是准备好运行一次复制到你的项目的完整示例。This is a complete sample ready to run once you have copied it to your project. 可以检查和取消选中项目、 使用文本框中添加项和一次单击保存按钮，清除选中的项。You can check and uncheck items, use the text box to add items and once you have clicked the save button, clear the checked items. [!code-cpp[Classic CheckedListBox Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic CheckedListBox Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic CheckedListBox Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic CheckedListBox Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic CheckedListBox Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic CheckedListBox Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 选中索引的集合是到集合中的所有项的索引子集控件。The collection of checked indexes is a subset of the indexes into the collection of all items in the control. 这些索引指定项在选中或不确定状态。These indexes specify items in a checked or indeterminate state. ## Examples 下面的示例枚举中的选中的项若要查看内容检查状态项中。The following example enumerates the checked items in the to see what check state an item is in. 该示例演示了如何使用属性来获取，并属性来获取。The example demonstrates using the property to get the , and the property to get the . 使用第一个循环方法以获取的每个选中的项，根据给定的项的索引。The first loop uses the method to get the of each checked item, given the index of the item. 第二个循环也使用，但使用方法来检索项的索引。The second loop also uses , but uses the method to retrieve the index for the item. [!code-cpp[CheckedListBox#2](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/CheckedListBox/CPP/source.cpp#2)] [!code-csharp[CheckedListBox#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/CheckedListBox/CS/source.cs#2)] [!code-vb[CheckedListBox#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/CheckedListBox/VB/source.vb#2)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property CheckedItems As CheckedListBox.CheckedItemCollection

summary.span: Collection of checked items in this .

span.span: Collection of checked items in this .
The collection for the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 集合是中的对象的子集的项集合，集合表示只有是`Checked`或`Indeterminate`。The collection is a subset of the objects in the collection, representing only those items whose is `Checked` or `Indeterminate`. 在此集合中的索引按升序排序。The indexes in this collection are in ascending order. ## Examples 下面的示例枚举中的选中的项若要查看内容检查状态项中。The following example enumerates the checked items in the to see what check state an item is in. 该示例演示了如何使用属性来获取，并属性来获取。The example demonstrates using the property to get the , and the property to get the . 使用第一个循环方法以获取的每个选中的项，根据给定的项的索引。The first loop uses the method to get the of each checked item, given the index of the item. 第二个循环也使用，但使用方法来检索项的索引。The second loop also uses , but uses the method to retrieve the index for the item. 若要运行此示例中，执行以下步骤：To run this example, perform the following steps: 1. 创建新的 Windows 窗体应用程序。Create a new Windows Forms application. 2. 添加和一个到窗体。Add a and a to the form. 3. 将该按钮命名`WhatIsChecked`，添加一个处理程序为其事件，并复制以下处理程序的正文中的代码中。Name the button `WhatIsChecked`, add a handler for its event, and copy in the code from the body of the following handler. 4. 添加到一些项。Add some items to the . 5. 运行该示例并检查一些列表框中的复选框。Run the example and check some of the check boxes in the list box. 6. 单击按钮。Click the button. 您将看到一系列消息框，指示已检查的项。You will see a series of message boxes that indicate which items were checked. [!code-cpp[CheckedListBox#2](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/CheckedListBox/CPP/source.cpp#2)] [!code-csharp[CheckedListBox#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/CheckedListBox/CS/source.cs#2)] [!code-vb[CheckedListBox#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/CheckedListBox/VB/source.vb#2)]

summary.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the check box should be toggled when an item is selected.

value.span: 如果立即; 应用复选标记否则为。

span.span: if the check mark is applied immediately; otherwise, .
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 指示选定的项时是否应切换复选框。 indicates whether the check box should be toggled whenever an item is selected. 默认行为是更改在第一次单击，选择，然后让用户再次单击以应用复选标记。The default behavior is to change the selection on the first click, and then have the user click again to apply the check mark. 在某些情况下，但是，您可能愿意项选中只要单击它。In some instances, however, you might prefer have the item checked as soon as it is clicked. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何初始化通过设置控件， ，和属性。The following code example demonstrates initializing a control by setting the , , and properties. 示例填充控件和 sets到控件的属性。The example populates the with controls and sets the to the property of the control. 若要运行该示例，请将以下代码粘贴在一个窗体，其中包含名为`CheckedListBox1`，并调用`InitializeCheckListBox`从窗体的构造函数或 Load 方法的方法。To run the example, paste the following code in a form containing a named `CheckedListBox1` and call the `InitializeCheckListBox` method from the form's constructor or Load method. [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.PropertyGridExample#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.PropertyGridExample/CPP/form1.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.PropertyGridExample#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.PropertyGridExample/CS/form1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.PropertyGridExample#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.PropertyGridExample/VB/form1.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public Custom Event Click As EventHandler

summary.span: Occurs when the user clicks the control.

span.span: Occurs when the user clicks the control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 事件将传递给其事件处理程序，因此它仅指示发生了单击操作。The event passes an to its event handler, so it only indicates that a click has occurred. 如果需要更具体的鼠标信息 （如按钮单击次数、 鼠标轮旋转或位置），使用并传递的事件到事件处理程序。If you need more specific mouse information (such as the button, number of clicks, wheel rotation, or location), use the and events, which pass a to the event handler. 由用户的操作系统的鼠标设置确定一次双击。A double-click is determined by the mouse settings of the user's operating system. 用户可以调整期间双击鼠标左键单击之间可以经过时间的量。The user can adjust the amount of time that can pass between clicks during a double-click of a mouse button. 每次用户双击一个控件时引发事件。The event is raised every time the user double-clicks a control. 例如，如果你具有用于事件处理方法和事件的窗体中，双击窗体之后和调用这两个事件处理方法时引发的事件。For example, if you have event-handling methods for the and events of a form, the events are raised when the form is double-clicked and both event-handling methods are called. 如果用户双击不支持的控件事件，可能两次引发事件。If the user double-clicks a control that does not support the event, the event might be raised twice. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何将此成员。The following code example demonstrates the use of this member. 在示例中，事件处理程序报告的匹配项事件。In the example, an event handler reports on the occurrence of the event. 此报告可帮助您了解事件发生的并可以帮助您进行调试。This report helps you to learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging. 若要报告或频繁发生的事件上多个事件，请考虑更换与或将消息附加到多行。To report on multiple events or on events that occur frequently, consider replacing with or appending the message to a multiline . 若要运行此代码示例，请将其粘贴到包含类型的实例的项目名为`CheckedListBox1`。To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of type named `CheckedListBox1`. 然后，确保事件处理程序相关联事件。Then ensure that the event handler is associated with the event. [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples#157](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples/CS/EventExamples.cs#157)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples#157](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples/VB/EventExamples.vb#157)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果不显式调用 方法，则在引用 属性时将会调用此方法。If you do not explicitly call the method, it will be called when the property is referenced. > [!NOTE] > 获取或设置属性，必须添加对引用`Accessibility`随.NET Framework 一起安装的程序集。To get or set the property, you must add a reference to the `Accessibility` assembly installed with the .NET Framework.

span.para: 重写时派生类中不应调用基类的方法。
When overriding in a derived class, you should not call the base class's method.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性不应重写，用于调整派生控件的属性。The property should not be overridden and used to adjust the properties of your derived control. 属性，如， ，并应设置在控件中的相应属性如，和。Properties such as the , , and should be set by the corresponding properties in your control such as , and . 包装标准 Windows 控件类，或若要设置样式不提供由 Windows 窗体的命名空间时应只扩展。The should only be extended when you are wrapping a standard Windows control class or to set styles not provided by the Windows Forms namespace. 有关创建控制参数的详细信息，请参阅`CreateWindow`并`CreateWindowEx`函数和`CREATESTRUCT`结构中的 Windows Platform SDK 参考文档位于 MSDN Library http://msdn.microsoft.com/library。For more information about creating control parameters, see the `CreateWindow` and `CreateWindowEx` functions and the `CREATESTRUCT` structure documentation in the Windows Platform SDK reference located in the MSDN Library at http://msdn.microsoft.com/library. ## Examples 下面的代码示例扩展了属性的派生的类。The following code example extends the property of a derived class. 更改属性时，这将导致按钮以显示而不是。The property is changed, which causes the button to display an rather than an . 此示例需要您有一个类继承自类。This example requires that you have a class that inherits from the class. [!code-cpp[CreateParams#3](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/CreateParams/CPP/createparams.cpp#3)] [!code-csharp[CreateParams#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/CreateParams/CS/createparams.cs#3)] [!code-vb[CreateParams#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/CreateParams/VB/createparams.vb#3)]

When overriding the property in a derived class, use the base class's property to extend the base implementation. Otherwise, you must provide all the implementation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 默认情况下显示及其包含的项的默认字符串。By default the displays the default string for the items it contains. 但是，可以显示不同类型的对象，可能想要更改显示的字符串通过指定属性。However, the can display diverse types of objects and you may want to change the displayed string by specifying the property. 如果指定的属性不存在，或的值属性为空字符串 ("")，该对象的结果改为显示方法。If the specified property does not exist, or the value of the property is an empty string (""), the results of the object's method are displayed instead. 如果新值的不能设置维护以前的值。If the new value of the cannot be set, the previous value is maintained. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何初始化通过设置控件， ，和属性。The following code example demonstrates initializing a control by setting the , , and properties. 示例填充控件和 sets到控件的属性。The example populates the with controls and sets the to the property of the control. 若要运行该示例，请将以下代码粘贴在一个窗体，其中包含名为`CheckedListBox1`，并调用`InitializeCheckListBox`从窗体的构造函数或 Load 方法的方法。To run the example, paste the following code in a form containing a named `CheckedListBox1` and call the `InitializeCheckListBox` method from the form's constructor or Load method. remarks.format: ## Remarks 此事件由一个所有者描述。This event is used by an owner-drawn . 引发事件时，才属性设置为或。The event is raised only when the property is set to or . 可以使用此事件来执行所需绘制项的任务。You can use this event to perform the tasks needed to draw items in the . 如果您已经有大小可变的项 (即设置为)，则绘制该项之前引发事件。If you have a variable-sized item (that is, is set to ), the event is raised before the item is drawn. 可以创建的事件处理程序事件以指定要绘制在事件处理程序中的项的大小事件。You can create an event handler for the event to specify the size for the item that you are going to draw in your event handler for the event. 此事件与此类无关。This event is not relevant to this class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 检查状态直到会被更新后事件发生。The check state is not updated until after the event occurs. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何将此成员。The following code example demonstrates the use of this member. 在示例中，事件处理程序报告的匹配项事件。In the example, an event handler reports on the occurrence of the event. 此报告可帮助您了解事件发生的并可以帮助您进行调试。This report helps you to learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging. 若要报告或频繁发生的事件上多个事件，请考虑更换与或将消息附加到多行。To report on multiple events or on events that occur frequently, consider replacing with or appending the message to a multiline . 若要运行此代码示例，请将其粘贴到包含类型的实例的项目名为`CheckedListBox1`。To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of type named `CheckedListBox1`. 然后，确保事件处理程序相关联事件。Then ensure that the event handler is associated with the event. [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples#156](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples/CS/EventExamples.cs#156)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples#156](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples/VB/EventExamples.vb#156)]

value.span: 项区域的高度（以像素为单位）。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此测量值基于字体高度加一小块边距，以提供的项周围的空白区域上。This measurement is based on the font height plus a small margin to provide white space around the item. 字体更改为 9.75 磅 arial 字体时，"g"和"y"等字符的扩展程序无法正确显示。The extenders of characters such as "g" and "y" do not display properly when the font is changed to 9.75-point Arial. 若要更正此问题，派生的类从并重写返回`base.ItemHeight+2`。To correct this, derive a class from and override to return `base.ItemHeight+2`.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Items As CheckedListBox.ObjectCollection

summary.span: Gets the collection of items in this .

span.span: Gets the collection of items in this .
The collection representing the items in the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性使您能够获取对当前存储中的项列表的引用控件。The property enables you to obtain a reference to the list of items that are currently stored in a control. 与此引用，可以将项添加、 删除项，并获取集合中项的计数。With this reference, you can add items, remove items, and obtain a count of the items in the collection. 可使用项集合执行的任务的详细信息，请参阅类参考主题。For more information on the tasks that can be performed with the item collection, see the class reference topics. ## Examples 下面的示例枚举中的选中的项若要查看内容检查状态项中。The following example enumerates the checked items in the to see what check state an item is in. 该示例使用属性来获取要检索其索引的项使用方法。The example uses the property to get the to retrieve the index of an item using the method. 该示例还演示了如何使用属性来获取，并属性来获取。The example also demonstrates using the property to get the , and the property to get the . 使用第一个循环方法以获取的每个选中的项，根据给定的项的索引。The first loop uses the method to get the of each checked item, given the index of the item. 第二个循环也使用，但使用方法来检索项的索引。The second loop also uses , but uses the method to retrieve the index for the item. summary.span: Raises the event.

span.span: Raises the event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法选择或清除复选框的单击的项。The method selects or clears the check box of the item that is clicked. 如果属性设置为`true`，从所选或已清除状态第一次单击项会切换复选框。If the property is set to `true`, the check box is switched from a selected or cleared state the first time the item is clicked. 否则，仅当已选择该项切换复选框。Otherwise, the check box is switched only if the item is already selected. 引发事件时，将通过委托调用事件处理程序。Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate. 有关详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). 方法还允许派生类对事件进行处理而不必附加委托。The method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate. 这是在派生类中处理事件的首选技术。This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.

span.para: 重写时在派生类中，请务必调用基类的方法，以便已注册的委托接收事件。
When overriding in a derived class, be sure to call the base class’s method so that registered delegates receive the event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性确定是否可以选择一项的列表框中，也可以选择任何项。The property determines whether one item in the list box can be selected or no items can be selected. 有关不支持多个所选内容的对象。For objects, multiple selection is not supported. 您可以将模式设置为一项或没有任何项。You can set the mode to one item or no items. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何初始化通过设置控件以允许在列表中选择一个项。The following code example demonstrates initializing a control by setting the to allow one item in the list to be selected. 若要运行该示例，请将以下代码粘贴在一个窗体，其中包含名为`CheckedListBox1`，并调用`InitializeCheckListBox`从窗体的构造函数或 Load 方法的方法。To run the example, paste the following code in a form containing a named `CheckedListBox1` and call the `InitializeCheckListBox` method from the form's constructor or Load method. remarks.format: ## Remarks 值时`true`传递，则此方法设置值设为`Checked`。When a value of `true` is passed, this method sets the value to `Checked`. 值为`false`设置到`Unchecked`。A value of `false` sets to `Unchecked`. ## Examples 下面的示例枚举中的项和检查列表中的每个其他项。The following example enumerates the items in the and checks every other item in the list. 该示例演示了如何使用和方法来设置项的复选状态。The example demonstrates using the and methods to set the check state of an item. 要检查的每个其他项调用来设置到`Indeterminate`，而上要设置为选中的状态的其他项调用`Checked`。For every other item that is to be checked, is called to set the to `Indeterminate`, while is called on the other item to set the checked state to `Checked`. 该示例还演示了如何使用属性来获取若要获取的项。The example also demonstrates using the property to get the to get the of items. [!code-cpp[CheckedListBox#3](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/CheckedListBox/CPP/source.cpp#3)] [!code-csharp[CheckedListBox#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/CheckedListBox/CS/source.cs#3)] [!code-vb[CheckedListBox#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/CheckedListBox/VB/source.vb#3)]

remarks.format: ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何初始化通过设置控件， ，和属性。The following code example demonstrates initializing a control by setting the , , and properties. 示例填充控件和 sets到控件的属性。The example populates the with controls and sets the to the property of the control. 若要运行该示例，请将以下代码粘贴在一个窗体，其中包含名为`CheckedListBox1`，并调用`InitializeCheckListBox`从窗体的构造函数或 Load 方法的方法。To run the example, paste the following code in a form containing a named `CheckedListBox1` and call the `InitializeCheckListBox` method from the form's constructor or Load method. [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.PropertyGridExample#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.PropertyGridExample/CPP/form1.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.PropertyGridExample#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.PropertyGridExample/CS/form1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.PropertyGridExample#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.PropertyGridExample/VB/form1.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool UseCompatibleTextRendering { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

summary.span: Gets or sets a value that determines whether to use the class ([!INCLUDE[ndptecgdiplus](~/includes/ndptecgdiplus-md.md)]) or the class ([!INCLUDE[ndptecgdi](~/includes/ndptecgdi-md.md)]) to render text.

span.span: Gets or sets a value that determines whether to use the class ([!INCLUDE[ndptecgdiplus](~/includes/ndptecgdiplus-md.md)]) or the class ([!INCLUDE[ndptecgdi](~/includes/ndptecgdi-md.md)]) to render text.

value.span: 如果类应该用于执行文本呈现，以便与 1.0 和 1.1 版中的兼容性。

span.span: if the class should be used to perform text rendering for compatibility with versions 1.0 and 1.1.
of the .NET Framework; otherwise, .
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks `UseCompatibleTextRendering`属性用于提供 visual 兼容性 Windows 窗体控件之间呈现文本使用类和[!INCLUDE[net_v10_short](~/includes/net-v10-short-md.md)]和[!INCLUDE[net_v11_short](~/includes/net-v11-short-md.md)]的应用程序执行自定义文本呈现使用类。The `UseCompatibleTextRendering` property is intended to provide visual compatibility between Windows Forms controls that render text using the class and [!INCLUDE[net_v10_short](~/includes/net-v10-short-md.md)] and [!INCLUDE[net_v11_short](~/includes/net-v11-short-md.md)] applications that perform custom text rendering using the class. 在大多数情况下，如果不从升级您的应用程序[!INCLUDE[net_v10_short](~/includes/net-v10-short-md.md)]或[!INCLUDE[net_v11_short](~/includes/net-v11-short-md.md)]，则建议您保留`UseCompatibleTextRendering`设置的默认值为`false`。In most cases, if your application is not being upgraded from [!INCLUDE[net_v10_short](~/includes/net-v10-short-md.md)] or [!INCLUDE[net_v11_short](~/includes/net-v11-short-md.md)], it is recommended that you leave `UseCompatibleTextRendering` set to the default value of `false`. [!INCLUDE[ndptecgdi](~/includes/ndptecgdi-md.md)]基于类中引入了[!INCLUDE[dnprdnlong](~/includes/dnprdnlong-md.md)]为了提高性能，使文本看起来不错，并提高对国际字体支持。The [!INCLUDE[ndptecgdi](~/includes/ndptecgdi-md.md)] based class was introduced in the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnlong](~/includes/dnprdnlong-md.md)] to improve performance, make text look better, and improve support for international fonts. 在早期版本的[!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)]，则[!INCLUDE[ndptecgdiplus](~/includes/ndptecgdiplus-md.md)]基于类用于执行所有文本呈现。In earlier versions of the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)], the [!INCLUDE[ndptecgdiplus](~/includes/ndptecgdiplus-md.md)] based class was used to perform all text rendering. [!INCLUDE[ndptecgdi](~/includes/ndptecgdi-md.md)] 计算字符间距和自动换行中的不同[!INCLUDE[ndptecgdiplus](~/includes/ndptecgdiplus-md.md)]。 calculates character spacing and word wrapping differently from [!INCLUDE[ndptecgdiplus](~/includes/ndptecgdiplus-md.md)]. 使用 Windows 窗体应用程序中类来呈现文本，这可能会导致使用的控件的文本才会显示不同的应用程序中的其他文本。In a Windows Forms application that uses the class to render text, this could cause the text for controls that use to appear different from the other text in the application. 若要解决此不兼容性，可以设置`UseCompatibleTextRendering`属性设置为`true`特定控件。To resolve this incompatibility, you can set the `UseCompatibleTextRendering` property to `true` for a specific control. 若要设置`UseCompatibleTextRendering`到`true`应用程序中的所有受支持控件，调用方法的参数替换`true`。To set `UseCompatibleTextRendering` to `true` for all supported controls in the application, call the method with a parameter of `true`.

remarks.format: ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何重写方法以处理操作系统消息中标识结构。The following code example demonstrates overriding the method to handle operating system messages identified in the structure. 在此示例中了解另一个应用程序将变为活动状态时处理 WM_ACTIVATEAPP 操作系统消息。The WM_ACTIVATEAPP operating system message is handled in this example to know when another application is becoming active. 请参阅位于 MSDN Library 的 Platform SDK 文档参考http://msdn.microsoft.com/library若要了解可用， ，和值。Refer to the Platform SDK documentation reference located in the MSDN Library at http://msdn.microsoft.com/library to understand the available , , and values. 可以在 MSDN 库中也是可用平台 SDK （Core SDK 部分） 下载中包含 Windows.h 标头文件中找到实际的常量值http://msdn.microsoft.com/library。Actual constant values can be found in the Windows.h header file included in the Platform SDK (Core SDK section) download, which is also available in the MSDN Library at http://msdn.microsoft.com/library. [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.Control.WndProc#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.Control.WndProc/CPP/form1.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.Control.WndProc#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.Control.WndProc/CS/form1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.Control.WndProc#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.Control.WndProc/VB/form1.vb#1)]
